name: places/ChIJv1UJ8bxZwokRySAGNrj94G8
formattedAddress: 154 W 18th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 154 W 18th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I discovered Lazzoni for the first time as I walked down west 18th Street in New York City. My husband and I were in the process of sorting out a purveyor of furniture reminiscing Northern European Mid Century. Lazzoni’s surfaces combining iron wood, glass, and ceramic finishes promised durability as well as a well tailored upholstery.  Their line is as impeccable as I had envisioned. Their imported products are high quality produced in one of the most beautiful areas of Ankara.  Reviews seemed written by predominant long term customers very loyal to the brand’s reputation. As a visual artist my purpose was to recreate a supporting atmosphere for my art and Lazzoni lent itself like a glove. Furthermore, the staff’s personal attention was enthusiastic, intelligent, and honest.  What more can one expect when decorating a new home?

originalText.text: Several of our friends bought furnitures from Lazzoni so we knew of the high quality and clean, modern styles. Our experience from start to finish was great. They always recognized our faces ever since we went into the store for the first time. The entire team is very hospitable, patient, and took care of us from start to finish. These are high-end, luxury furniture with hospitality to match.  We went into the showroom many times to test out different couches and see different colors and variations, and never felt pushed or impatience from anyone. We wanted design opinions, which Birce was very helpful with, and she also provided designs and rendering according to our floor plan very quickly. Even the white glove service team was courteous and prompt in setting up our furnitures without any problems. Highly recommend!

originalText.text:
I'm happy with my experience purchasing a sofa at Lazzoni. I've been looking for a new sofa for a while and friends have recently purchased theirs from Lazzoni so I went to the Chelsea store to see what they have.

Guleycan and Behzat were extremely helpful in showing me all the options in the showroom and also mocking up what the sofas would look like with custom fabric. They were very precise in recommending options that truly fit my space by making sure we measured the space and how the sofa would fit.

Build and delivery took 10 weeks but it was well worth the wait. The time frame was communicated to me up front so there was no surprise. I landed on the Panna three seater and it fits perfectly in my apartment. It's especially a huge hit for movie nights with the adjustable back. The design is beautiful and elegant!

originalText.text: The Lazzoni showroom is beautiful! The design and quality of the furniture is excellent. Mehmet Can Akin helped me select a table for a client of mine, he was extremely courteous and professional. We went with the Mons table - it was a great price and very good lead-time.  My client just received it and loves it! I definitely recommend Lazzoni, and working with Mehmet!

originalText.text: Excellent store, people and products. Mehmet and Azad were extremely responsive and professional. Mehmet is also a magician in understanding your needs and tailoring the furniture based on your spaces and desires. Highly recommended!
